name: Cuddly Crown Chaos!
description:
Cuddly Crown Chaos was developed at the Global Game Jam 2015 at the NYU Game Center by Will Zhou, John Bujalski, Lyndsey Jane Moulds, Angela Lee, and Kailin Zhu.

Music by Andrew Struck-Marcell, euphonium fanfares by Spencer Hale.

To play fullscreen in your browser, go here!

If you enjoy this game, consider donating or buying the desktop version!
